attributes.action: Disregard any petition that calls for the banning of a political party!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We live in a supposedly democratic society, it is therefore pointless to allow any petition that calls for the banning of a political party, as in the case of Mr Shahid Anwar's attempt to ban the BNP.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
